text: Barrels of fermenting beer at Timmermans Brouwerij Timmermans (or Timmermans Brewery) is a lambic brewery in Itterbeek. It was founded in 1702. ==References== ==External links== *Official site (English) Category:Belgian brands Category:Breweries of Flanders Category:Companies based in Flemish Brabant Category:Dilbeek
title: Timmermans Brewery
